content.value: By setting up my own JSON server through Github, I was able to mock up the data being pulled by this widget. This tool can be used by going her: JSON Server Typicode

title.value: How I faked the data for this API call

content.value: Sitecore JavaScript Services (JSS) is a complete SDK for JavaScript developers that enables you to build full-fledged solutions using Sitecore and modern JavaScript UI libraries and frameworks.
Use your favorite JavaScript framework powered by an enterprise experience platform

title.value: Build Headless JavaScript applications with the power of Sitecore
